message:
Spent an enjoyable evening with over 240 youngsters from J&K. They belong to militancy affected families, orphanages & weaker sections. The youngsters from J&K, who are in Delhi as a part of "Wattan Ko Jano" initiative amazed me with their curiosity. They asked me many questions. 

My young friends are very passionate about J&K's progress & want good infrastructure in the state.  Spoke about steps for J&K's development, including in areas like tourism, digital connectivity, housing for all. http://nm-4.com/srkc
